short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your product skills by showing a random cognitive bias every time you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cognitive Biases can be levaraged to improve products. Every time you open a new tab in Chrome, a random bias will be shown with a tip on how to leverage the bias in your product.
